txt.en: 'Would you like to be flagged as having completed Volume IV Book 7 of the Epic quest series? If so, speak to me again!
'You know how this works now, right? I'm sure you do! Completion of this quest will flag you as having completed Volume IV Book 7 of the Epic quest.'
Completion of this quest will flag your character as having completed all the quests in Book 7 of the Epic quest series of Volume IV.
Talk to Istien to complete Volume IV, Book 7!
